title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2.14 - Record of checkers assigned to motor vehicles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2.14 - Record of checkers assigned to motor vehicles

State Regulations

Every pier superintendent having overall charge or
supervision of the operation of the pier or other waterfront terminal who is
employed by a carrier of freight by water having the responsibility of
safeguarding waterborne freight shall cause to be recorded on the appropriate
documents reflecting delivery or removal of cargo to or from the pier or
terminal by motor vehicle, the full names of all checkers assigned to such
vehicle. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
